subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# last day of a lunar month
# [[dark]], [[unclear]], [[obscure]]
# [[night]]
# 67th [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "darkening" ([[𝍈]])
